column1: prompt
Provide an appropriate word to complete the sentence There is a great need to preserve the environment and reduce our _____ on natural resources.
Give a suitable example for the phrase "close cousin"
Modify the sentence to make an exclusive statement Everyone should be careful when handling sharp knives.
What is the main difference between these two terms? Supply and demand
Provide a suitable example for 'conflict of interest'
Generate a suitable metaphor to convey the concept of 'breaking a barrier'

Trim a 500-word essay so that it fits within a 300-word limit. I've been fascinated by tales of ancient times for as long as I can remember. When I was a child, I would beg my parents to take me to the local library to read the legends and stories from bygone eras. I had a thirst for knowledge that I still feel to this day. Every time I read about a person or place from the distant past, I felt a connection, as if I could feel their presence.
Research the effectiveness and side effects of using aspirin as an over-the-counter pain reliever.

Process an employee's request to work from home once a week. Employee request: As a working parent, I would like to be able to work from home one day a week to better manage my schedule and spend more quality time with my children.
Describe the moment when a person realizes they need to make a big change.
Select a book title for an adventure story.
Develop a survey to survey the opinions of customers on a new product. Product: Home security system
Formulate a "Yes" or "No" question with the given statement. The teacher read the students an old fable.
Re-write the given code preserving the structure and formatting. var x=10; for(var i=1;i<x;++i){console.log(i);}

Identify a student's learning style from their description. I’m always looking for new ways to solve a problem. I often brainstorm ideas with friends, or do extra research or reading to gain more knowledge.
Edit a poorly-written sentence to make it more readable. Despite the fact that the app stores contain hundreds of thousands of apps it doesn't mean they are all necessarly good ones.
Explain the concept of parallel computing to a novice.
Summarize the key points of a research paper in 500 words. Topic: The effects of climate change on global agriculture
Summarize the pros and cons of a particular blogging platform. Platform: WordPress
Generate an original joke about a car.
Edit the input sentence in a way that shows an appreciation for the knowledge shared. My colleagues helped me understand the concept.
List two methods to reduce our carbon footprint.
Provide five adjectives that describe the characteristic of a good negotiator.
Identify a feature of artificial intelligence.
Make a painting of a sea turtle.
Create a question that could be used in a trivia quiz.
Given the input, explain why students should learn coding.
Generate a list of vegetables, fruits and proteins that are low in carbs.
Rewrite the following paragraph modifying the tense and changing the structure. I was running around in circles and struggled to keep up with the tasks I had to complete.
Describe the impact of the recent economic shutdown.

Edit this email so that it better follows the rules of good email etiquette. Hey there!

Hope you are doing well. I wanted to check in with you about the project. Its been quite a while. What’s the status?

Given a description of the event, summarize it into a short paragraph. The event was a charity walkathon organized by XYZ to raise money for a local hospital. People of all ages came together to participate. The walk took place in a park and had a festive vibe with balloons, music, and food stalls.

Create a summary that captures the main goal of the following presentation. The presentation focused on the advantages of AI in customer service, including reduced wait times and increased customer satisfaction due to the use of automation.
Research the history of the internet, and create an outline that summarizes the key moments.
Write an article about the advantages and disadvantages of online learning.
Generate six random words.
Act as a tutor to an elementary student who needs help understanding how to add two fractions. 7/9 + 4/5
Construct a SQL query to list all the customers from the US with a customer rating of 5.
Suggest a movie title for a drama about a family that struggles to stay together during difficult times.
Make a list of five improvements to enhance the customer experience.
Provide advice for someone who is seeking a new career path.
Important a Python script to print the sum of two numbers. 4 + 1
Give advice on how to approach a problem effectively. My team has been struggling with our project for a month. We are not making any progress on our deliverables.
Science trivia - what is the atomic number of a gold atom?
Classify a given statement. Solar energy is the cleanest and most renewable form of energy.
Generate a creative and catchy slogan for a pet store.
Design a meal plan for weight loss. I am looking to lose 10 pounds in one month.

Choose the correct spelling from given options The correct spelling for the word 'seperate' is:
A. seperat
B. seperate
C. seprate
D. seperrate
Suggest a strategy for achieving a goal. My goal is to be debt-free in two years.
Compare two things and evaluate which one is better. Compare online learning and traditional classroom learning.
Sort this list from shortest to longest. Giraffe, Chimpanzee, Kangaroo, Gorilla
Who is the main antagonist in the movie Jurassic Park?
How many red flowers are in the garden? The garden has ten white daisies, two yellow tulips and three purple orchids.
How long did it take Neil Armstrong to travel to the Moon?
Add the following numbers: 5 + 7 + 9
Calculate the average of the following numbers: 1, 3, 7
Create a sound system for a library.
Suppose you are speaking to a customer service agent via a chatbot. Ask a question regarding the available services.
Name some animals that are endangered.
Predict the future direction of the stock market.
Debate about the use of genetically modified organisms (GMOs).
Come up with a business plan for a childcare centre.
Prepare a speech to give an inspirational talk to primary school children.
Compile a list of recommended websites for learning about computer science.
Design a product to address a given issue. The issue is that the elderly don't have access to the same technology as younger people.
Reformulate the given sentence to give it a different emphasis. The employees learn about the new products.
Rewrite the given sentence using compound predicate. The profits soar high and the losses were large.
Rewrite the given statements as rhetorical question. This defeats the purpose.
Analyze this sentence and tell me if it's correct. We need to find the cheapest and fastest travel option.

Select an appropriate conclusion for this short story. Once upon a time, there was a brave little rabbit named Wilbur. He had been living in the forest for some time, and he was tired of living all alone. All of the other forest animals were friendly to him, but he wanted to find someone who he could really connect with and be best friends with. Wilbur decided he would set out on a big journey to find just the right friend.
Rewrite the following question in an interrogative sentence It is necessary to go to the store
Generate an opening sentence for a story about a 13 year old living in a mountain cabin.
Generate a sentence predicting what will happen in the following scenario. A chicken walks into a library
Automatically generate a sexual free meme caption.
Generate song lyrics that express love and longing.
Explain the conflict between two characters in the following story. John and Bill have been lifelong rivals since their first meeting when they competed for a job at the same company.
Reword the following statement to focus on the positive aspects. I don't like going to the gym because it's boring.
Fix the underlying message of the following sentence. You don't need to bother.
Predicte the stock price of Google in five years.
Give a polite response to this statement. That's a horrible idea.
Describe the topography of the city Los Angeles.
Describe a game of chance.
Paraphrase the following sentence: "It will have an immense impact".
Name two U.S. states that allow people to obtain a driver's license at the age of 16.
Summarize the following Wikipedia article: "The United Nations".
Compare the economic systems of capitalism and socialism.
Edit the following sentence to make it more concise: "The food that we ate for the party was absolutely delicious."
Classify the following sentence as a statement or question: "The cat jumped onto the table".
Research a interesting fact about spiders and summarize it in two sentences.
Explain the concept of RNA interference.
Name and describe three common input/output operations.
Identify and explain two major challenges facing the agriculture industry in developing countries.
Generate a possible use case for a home security system.
